content.en: Vein recognition advancements: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the accuracy of finger vein recognition. These algorithms include modified Hausdorff distance, Local Directional Code (LDC), adaptive Gabor filter, score-level fusion, and hybrid descriptors. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to enhance the identification ability of vein patterns, optimize palm vein recognition, improve biometric verification, and minimize interference from non-venous factors. These advancements in algorithmic techniques have the potential to revolutionize the field of finger vein recognition and enhance its reliability and effectiveness.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for venegenkendelse: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af fingervene-genkendelse. Disse algoritmer inkluderer modificeret Hausdorff-distancen, Local Directional Code (LDC), adaptiv Gabor-filter, score-niveau fusion og hybride deskriptorer. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at forbedre genkendelsesevnen af venemønstre, optimere håndfladevene-genkendelse, forbedre biometrisk verifikation og minimere forstyrrelser fra ikke-venøse faktorer. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmeteknikker har potentialet til at revolutionere feltet for fingervene-genkendelse og øge dets pålidelighed og effektivitet.
